name: javascript-test-demo
description: Spherical Object  Constructor  var sphere = new Spherical() should create an Object that is of type Spherical jump function should return true and this is always moveForward function that should take a distance and return a position that is adding the distance moveForward should not allow negative numbers move function that should take direction and distance and return a position that is based on adding the distance travelled to current position roll function that will take a direction and travel the circumference of the circle in that direction, returning the position
